effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.

short_effect.black_white: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.

flavor_text.black_white: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.
